pullRequest.title: CB-8664: Use new FreeIPA health checks for instance status
pullRequest.bodyText:
Use the new FreeIPA health checks for the instance status. This is
used for the periodic polling of the status, the on demand status for
the health API, and for the internal repair status.
Unit tests were added and this was tested manually using a local
deployment of cloudbreak.
See detailed description in the commit message.

nodes.bodyText: FreeIpa or FreeIPA just asking because in this pr both word were used.

could you move the 3 if into 3 methods and name them, eg

validate/checkClusterProxyError

thanks
